title: A note on the Cuntz algebra automorphisms
abstract:
Permutative automorphisms of the Cuntz algebras $\mathcal{O}_n$ are in
bijection with the stable permutations of $[n]^k$. Thereby, it is used to
determine the restricted Weyl group of $Aut(\mathcal{O}_n)$ by describing all
satble permutations. In this note, we characterize some stable involutions of
rank one, and thus we prove Conjecture 12.2 of Brenti and Conti [Adv. Math. 381
(2021), p. 60].
